table-mapping.filter: (cntry_of_iss_cd = 'CN' OR sec_class_cd in ('DSUM', 'FORM')) AND asset_last_chg_dt >=dateadd(hh,-2,{FromTime}) AND asset_last_chg_dt <= {CurrentSyncTime}

table-mapping.source: govcorp..idxref_id_obj_xref_quote x inner join govcorp..quote q on q.quote_id = x.quote_id
table-mapping.filter: x.quote_id IN (SELECT quote_id FROM govcorp..quote WHERE price_src_cd='CPT' AND asset_id IN(SELECT a.asset_id FROM govcorp..asset a WHERE (a.cntry_of_iss_cd = 'CN' OR a.sec_class_cd in ('DSUM', 'FORM')) AND a.asset_last_chg_dt >= {FromTime} AND a.asset_last_chg_dt <= {CurrentSyncTime})) AND x.id_type_cd NOT IN ('EPS')
